summary: This document is a bank statement from Fifth Third Bank for the account of Requiro Scientia LLC for the period of September 1, 2017, to September 30, 2017. It details the account balance, transactions, and service charges incurred during the month.

persons.name: Carlo Gonzales
persons.context: Carlo Gonzales is identified as the Relationship Manager for the account held by Requiro Scientia LLC.

keyFacts: The account belongs to Requiro Scientia LLC.
The beginning balance for the account on September 1, 2017, was $366.00.
A service charge of $3.00 was withdrawn on September 13, 2017.
The ending balance for the account on September 30, 2017, was $363.00.
The statement indicates that the standard monthly service charge was waived due to meeting balance criteria.
